pacmangameplay.framedisplay
Class ScoreDisplay

java.lang.Object
  pacmangameplay.framedisplay.ScoreDisplay

public class ScoreDisplay
extends java.lang.Object

Calculates and displays the score of current user on the game play GUI.

Constructor Summary
ScoreDisplay(LevelLogic level)
           
 
Method Summary
 void drawScore(java.awt.Graphics g)
          This method displays the calculated scores on the game play GUI The displayed score keeps being updated as pacman eats different kind of score sources
 void getScore()
          This method calculates the score of the current level.
 int getTotalScore()
          Returns total score.
 void newGame()
          Resets all scores to 0 for a new game.
 void newLevel()
          Adds the score of the last level to the total score.
 void refresh(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ae)
          Updates dot count, bonuses eaten and ghosts eaten for the score calculation.
